introduction.name: Daniel Hu
about: I'm Daniel, a software developer who lives in Melbourne and valued experience sharing by writing tech blogs.

content.title: Software Engineer
description: Frontend: React, Redux, Saga
Backend: Node
DevOps: AWS, CircleCI, Docker, Pulumi

content.title: Backend Developer
description: Managed to develop and deploy more than five customized SEO websites within three months.
Showed high ability on finding the solution of the problem, able to find the bugs and fix them with high efficiency and quality.
Worked with three other members as a team, showed great cooperation and production abilities.

content.title: Software Development Intern
description: Agile Developing Environment, trained to work both effectively and flexibly.
Improved UI and user workflow of the website, which boosted the signed up users from 15 to 200. According to Google Analysis, the average daily visitors increased from 50 to approximately 300.
Core member of this startup company. Worked closely with the company leader and learned to think both innovatively and critically.

content.title: Creating an AWS Elastic Beanstalk Environment with Pulumi
content.description: Let’s go through the steps of setting up and deploying an AWS EB environment with Pulumi, who brought the IaC services to another level by allowing DevOps to write codes with their favourite languages.

content.title: 以程式碼建立S3+Cloudfront架構並用自動化部署你的React App - Setup your React application S3 + Cloudfront infrastructure and deployment automation with Pulumi & CircleCI
content.description: Spend your time wisely, setup your S3 + Cloudfront with code using Pulumi and automate your React App CI/CD pipeline with CircleCI.

content.title: 一週花 40 小時唸書，你敢說自己是「全職大學生」嗎？──5 點對比台澳教育差異 - A comparison of the education under the western and eastern culture
content.description: 從澳洲高等教育看台灣 修了 27 門課的大學二年級 vs 「我建議你這學期不要修超過 4 門課」

content.title: 使用ESLint, Prettier, Husky, Lint-staged以及Commitizen提升專案品質及一致性 - Increase your Javascript projects' quality and consistency with ESLint, Prettier, Husky, Lint-staged, and Commitizen
content.description: 一系列幫助撰寫乾淨程式碼和提升團隊程式一致性的利器。

content.title: 深入淺出搜尋引擎和自然語言處理 - A series of articles about the introduction to NLP and search engines
content.description: 自然語言處理是一門結合了人工智慧及語言學的學科。在墨爾本大學攻讀碩士的第一年，我接觸到了自然語言處理這個學門，從此愛上了它，之後的研究也因此朝這方向走下去。

description: Received the Melbourne School of Engineering Scholarship
GPA 3.91/4.3, 4 times on the Dean’s List.

content.title: Runner-Up of the 2019 IT Challenge
description: Managed to come up with a great IT solution to solve real-life needs. Nice teamwork with a fantastic team.

content.title: School of Engineering Scholarship
description: The Melbourne School of Engineering Scholarship is awarded to selected domestic and international Master's students on the basis of academic excellence.

content.title: Innovative Research Award
content.organization: Ministry of Science and Technology - Taiwan, ROC
description: Research project: "Image Recognition and Analysis of Metallographic".
Won the research award from out of 106 candidates in the field of Intelligence Computing. The candidates were from the best universities in Taiwan.
Python for Data processing / Machine Learning / Natural Language Processing (NLP)
React / Redux + Saga / Mirage.js / Storybook / Jest + Enzyme
CircleCI / Docker / Pulumi / Terraform (CI/CD + IaC)
AWS S3, Cloudfront, EC2, ECR, EB, IAM roles & policies management
Agile Development (SCRUM) / Git
